custom-sql.sql: SELECT DATA.* FROM (SELECT A.*,U.firstName,U.screenName, E.data_ AS userOrgCode FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT DATA.* FROM (SELECT A.*,U.firstName,U.screenName, E.data_ AS userOrgCode FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,AssetEntry B,AssetEntries_AssetCategories C,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE A.scienceAppId = B.classPK <isNotEmpty property="classNameId"> AND B.classNameId = #classNameId# </isNotEmpty> AND B.entryId = C.entryId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT DATA.* FROM (SELECT A.*,U.firstName,U.screenName, E.data_ AS userOrgCode FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppManager M,EDAPP_ScienceApp A,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE 1=1 <isNotEmpty property="managerId"> AND M.userId = #managerId# </isNotEmpty> AND M.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT DATA.* FROM (SELECT A.*,U.firstName,U.screenName, E.data_ AS userOrgCode FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppManager M,EDAPP_ScienceApp A,AssetEntry B,AssetEntries_AssetCategories C, User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE 1=1 <isNotEmpty property="managerId"> AND M.userId = #managerId# </isNotEmpty> AND M.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="classNameId"> AND B.classNameId = #classNameId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.scienceAppId = B.classPK AND B.entryId = C.entryId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM (SELECT A.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM (SELECT A.*,B.entryId,C.categoryId,U.screenName,E.data_ FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,AssetEntry B,AssetEntries_AssetCategories C,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE A.scienceAppId = B.classPK <isNotEmpty property="classNameId"> AND B.classNameId = #classNameId# </isNotEmpty> AND B.entryId = C.entryId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM (SELECT A.* FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,EDAPP_ScienceAppManager M,User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE 1=1 <isNotEmpty property="managerId"> AND M.userId = #managerId# </isNotEmpty> AND M.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM (SELECT A.*,B.entryId,C.categoryId,U.screenName,E.data_ FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A,AssetEntry B,AssetEntries_AssetCategories C,EDAPP_ScienceAppManager M, User_ U, ExpandoValue E WHERE 1=1 <isNotEmpty property="managerId"> AND M.userId = #managerId# </isNotEmpty> AND M.scienceAppId = A.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="classNameId"> AND B.classNameId = #classNameId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.scienceAppId = B.classPK AND B.entryId = C.entryId AND A.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="tableId"> AND E.tableId = #tableId# </isNotEmpty>

<isNotEmpty property="companyId"> AND A.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="name"> AND A.name = #name# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="appTypes"> AND A.appType IN (#appTypes#) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="editorTypes"> AND A.editorType IN (#editorTypes#) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="categoryIds"> AND C.categoryId IN (#categoryIds#) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="targetLanguage"> AND A.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="status"> AND A.status = #status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.authorId = #userId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppIds"> AND A.scienceAppId IN (@@scienceAppIds@@) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeSwNameAndSwTitle"> AND ( A.name LIKE '%@@likeSwNameAndSwTitle@@%' OR EXTRACTVALUE(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@likeSwNameAndSwTitle@@%' OR U.screenName LIKE '%@@likeSwNameAndSwTitle@@%' ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeSwName"> AND A.name LIKE '%@@likeSwName@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeSwTitle"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(A.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@likeSwTitle@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeUserName"> AND U.firstName LIKE '%@@likeUserName@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeOrgCode"> AND E.data_ IN (#likeOrgCode#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="likeDeveloper"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(A.developers, 'root/Developers[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@likeDeveloper@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="MAINSEARCHAPPLIST"> AND A.scienceAppId in ( #MAINSEARCHAPPLIST# ) </isNotEmpty>
GROUP BY A.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="sortField"> ORDER BY @@sortField@@ @@sortOrder@@ </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="defaultSortOrder"> ORDER BY A.createDate DESC </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty> ) AS DATA

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.simulationCreateDt, "%Y-%m-%d %T") AS simulationCreateDt, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701005,1,0)) AS QUEUED_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701006,1,0)) AS RUN_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701011,1,0)) AS SUCCESS_CNT, SUM(IF(B.jobStatus=1701012,1,0)) AS FAILED_CNT, B.simulationUuid, B.jobUuid FROM EDSIM_Simulation A, EDSIM_SimulationJob B WHERE A.simulationUuid = B.simulationUuid <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> AND A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.testYn = 'Y' AND B.jobPhase = '1301003' GROUP BY A.simulationUuid ORDER BY A.simulationCreateDt DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDSIM_Simulation A WHERE <isNotEmpty property="scienceAppId"> A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId# </isNotEmpty> AND A.testYn = 'Y';

SELECT AC.categoryId, COUNT(APP.scienceAppId) AS appCnt FROM AssetCategory AC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ESA.scienceAppId, ESA.targetLanguage, AE.categoryId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp ESA, (SELECT AEAC.categoryId, AE.* FROM AssetEntry AE LEFT OUTER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetCategories AEAC ON AE.entryId = AEAC.entryId WHERE AEAC.categoryId IS NOT NULL AND AE.classNameId = (SELECT classNameId FROM ClassName_ WHERE value = 'org.kisti.edison.science.model.ScienceApp') ORDER BY AE.entryId ) AE WHERE ESA.scienceAppId = AE.classPk AND ESA.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' ) APP ON AC.categoryId = APP.categoryId WHERE AC.parentCategoryId = #parentCategoryId# GROUP BY AC.categoryId HAVING COUNT(APP.scienceAppId) > 0

SELECT ESA.scienceAppId, AE.categoryId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp ESA, (SELECT AEAC.categoryId, AE.* FROM AssetEntry AE LEFT OUTER JOIN AssetEntries_AssetCategories AEAC ON AE.entryId = AEAC.entryId WHERE AEAC.categoryId IS NOT NULL AND AE.classNameId = (SELECT classNameId FROM ClassName_ WHERE value = 'org.kisti.edison.science.model.ScienceApp') ORDER BY AE.entryId ) AE WHERE ESA.scienceAppId = AE.classPk AND AE.categoryId = #categoryId#
SELECT A.*, B.data_ FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, ExpandoValue B WHERE A.appType = 'Solver' AND A.status = '1901004' AND A.authorId = B.classPK AND B.columnId = #columnId#

SELECT C.name as categoryTitle , D.name as parentCategoryTitle FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp A, EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink B, AssetCategory C, AssetCategory D WHERE A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId AND B.categoryId = C.categoryId AND C.parentCategoryId = D.categoryId AND A.scienceAppId = #scienceAppId#
SELECT scienceAppId, name, ExtractValue(title, 'root/Title[@language-id="ko_KR"]') as title, appType, status, version, groupId
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt

FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp WHERE targetLanguage like '%@@languageId@@%' <isNotEmpty property="modelSeqList"> AND scienceAppId in ( @@modelSeqList@@ ) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="modelSeqStr"> AND scienceAppId = #modelSeqStr# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="searchText"> AND ( ExtractValue(title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchText@@%' OR name like '%@@searchText@@%' ) </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="status"> AND status = #status# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
SELECT COUNT(distinct B.scienceAppId) AS totalCnt FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A, EDAPP_ScienceApp B, EDAPP_ScienceAppManager C, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT A.*, B.*,B.modifiedDate AS appModifiedDate FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A, EDAPP_ScienceApp B, EDAPP_ScienceAppManager C, User_ U, ExpandoValue E
SELECT A.*, B.*,B.modifiedDate AS appModifiedDate FROM EDAPP_ScienceAppCategoryLink A , EDAPP_ScienceApp B, User_ U, ExpandoValue E

WHERE <isNotEmpty property="companyId"> A.companyId = #companyId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="appType"> AND B.appType = #appType# </isNotEmpty> AND A.scienceAppId = B.scienceAppId <isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppSearch"> AND B.scienceAppId = C.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty> AND B.authorId = U.userId AND U.userId = E.classPK <isNotEmpty property="myManagerAppUserId"> AND C.userId = #myManagerAppUserId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND B.authorId = #userId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="columnId"> AND E.columnId = #columnId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="parentCategoryId"> AND A.parentCategoryId IN (#parentCategoryId#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="categoryId"> AND A.categoryId = #categoryId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="targetLanguage"> AND B.targetLanguage LIKE '%@@targetLanguage@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="status"> AND B.status = #status# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="APP_MANAGER_SEARCH_ALL"> AND ( B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SCIENCEAPPSTORE_SEARCH_ALL"> AND ( EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) OR EXTRACTVALUE(B.developers, 'root/Developers[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWNM"> AND B.name LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWTITLE"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(B.title, 'root/Title[@language-id="@@targetLanguage@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWUSERNM"> AND U.firstName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWORGNM"> AND E.data_ IN (#searchOrgCode#) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="SWDEV"> AND EXTRACTVALUE(B.developers, 'root/Developers[@language-id="@@languageId@@"]') LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="MAINSEARCHAPPLIST"> AND B.scienceAppId in ( #MAINSEARCHAPPLIST# ) </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="listsearch"> GROUP BY B.scienceAppId </isNotEmpty>
ORDER BY B.createDate DESC
<isNotEmpty property="begin"> LIMIT #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT scienceAppId, name, version, DATE_FORMAT(modifiedDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS modifiedDate, status, groupId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp WHERE companyId = #companyId# AND groupId = #groupId# AND name = #name# AND ( status = 1901003 OR status = 1901004 ) ORDER BY VERSION DESC

SELECT EB.boardSeq AS boardSeq, EB.title AS title, EB.content AS content, EB.groupId AS groupId, EB.customId AS customId, EB.writerId AS writerId, U.screenName AS screenName, DATE_FORMAT(EB.writerDate, '%d. %b. %Y') AS writerDate, DATE_FORMAT(EB.writerDate, '%H:%i') AS writerTime, DATE_FORMAT(EB.writerDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS writerDateForReply, EB.readCnt AS readCnt, EB.groupBoardSeq AS groupBoardSeq, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EDCON_Board EB_SUB WHERE EB_SUB.customId = #customId# AND EB_SUB.groupBoardSeq = EB.boardSeq ) AS replyCnt FROM EDCON_Board EB, EDCON_BoardDiv_Board EBB, User_ U WHERE EB.boardSeq = EBB.boardSeq AND EB.writerId = U.userId AND EBB.divCd= #divCd# AND EB.customId = #customId# AND EB.groupBoardSeq = #groupBoardSeq# ORDER BY EB.writerDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(distinct userId) AS count FROM EDSIM_Simulation WHERE scienceAppId = #scienceAppId#
SELECT COUNT(scienceAppId) AS count FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp WHERE workflowId = #workflowId#
SELECT scienceAppId FROM EDAPP_ScienceApp WHERE workflowId = #workflowId#
